main event: A metallic object, the size of a 15 RPM record, was observed moving 100 yards to the south over a 15 minute period.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes., The object was the size of a 15 RPM record., The report lists only one witness, indicating it was a personal sighting., The object's motion was documented as moving south during the observation., The conclusion suggested the sighting could possibly be a balloon.
